title: New champion incoming?
body:
Hey guys, it's Aerie!

I was in the champion thingy on this website and I saw something weird: Garen, Vi, Sona and Zed are all asleep and there are weird pictures when we go to their personal pages. It seems like it has a link with their deep desires. The theme of the new champion could be related to dreams and wishes? I made some research and found out later on Reddit that there are some files named after Jhin on the PBE server. And Jhin sort of reminds me of Djinn, some sort of genie that grants wishes. Could be. Or not. Whatever x) Tell me what you think!

Hugs'n'Kisses,

Aerie
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Well there ya go! I never knew it could be a reference to Djinn - a genie xD That's an awesome concept and if the champ is anything like a genie I'll definitely be buying it!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I know right? :D 
Though I have no idea how wishes could work. Ultimate: greatly buffs an ally in exchange for his survival? Interesting concept ^^

Jinns (so many different ways to spell it...) and Genies are two different things. A Jinn is a spirit who is able to possess humans. A Genie is a spirit imprisoned in a bottle/lamp who grants wishes when released.
but i think since theres 4 of em possible that its his abilities like his q to his r idk haha
an zed sona garen an vi are dead
jhin deadeye will come around i think around patch 6.2 or something
The teasers you saw have been dubbed "dead eye"
